name: rsvp
description: A set of commands allowing RSVP functionality

options.name: ontime
options.description: RSVPs you as attending the event on time

options.name: event
options.description: The event you are RSVPing to

options.name: calendar
options.description: The calendar the event is from. Defaults to 1

options.name: late
options.description: RSVPs you as attending the event late

options.name: event
options.description: The event you are RSVPing to

options.name: calendar
options.description: The calendar the event is from. Defaults to 1

options.name: not-going
options.description: RSVPs you as not attending the event

options.name: event
options.description: The event you are RSVPing to

options.name: calendar
options.description: The calendar the event is from. Defaults to 1

options.name: unsure
options.description: RSVPs you as unsure if you will be attending the event

options.name: event
options.description: The event you are RSVPing to

options.name: calendar
options.description: The calendar the event is from. Defaults to 1

options.name: remove
options.description: Removes your previous RSVP status from the event

options.name: event
options.description: The event you are removing your RSVP from

options.name: calendar
options.description: The calendar the event is from. Defaults to 1

options.name: list
options.description: Lists who has RSVPed to the event

options.name: event
options.description: The event to list RSVPs of

options.name: calendar
options.description: The calendar the event is from. Defaults to 1

options.name: limit
options.description: Sets a limit of how many people may attend the event

options.name: event
options.description: The event you are RSVPing to

options.name: limit
options.description: The max number of attendees. `-1` to disable the limit

options.name: calendar
options.description: The calendar the event is from. Defaults to 1

options.name: role
options.description: Sets the role assigned when a member RSVPs as attending the event. *Not automatically removed

options.name: event
options.description: The event you are RSVPing to

options.name: role
options.description: The role to assign. `@everyone` to disable role assignment.

options.name: calendar
options.description: The calendar the event is from. Defaults to 1
